name: github-pages-minify-test
description: A test repository for GitHub Pages with GitHub Actions for minify.

scripts.minify-html: find src -type f -name '*.html' -exec bash -c 'output_path="dist/${0#src/}"; mkdir -p "$(dirname "$output_path")" && npx html-minifier-terser --config-file html-minifier.json -o "$output_path" "$0"' {} \;
scripts.minify-css: find src -type f -name '*.css' -exec bash -c 'output_path="dist/${0#src/}"; mkdir -p "$(dirname "$output_path")" && npx clean-css-cli -o "$output_path" "$0"' {} \;
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run minify-html && npm run minify-css && npm run copy-assets
